pkgmetadata.longdescription: Interface to the Agave API // Provides an interface to the the many computational resources iPlant offers through their RESTful application programming interface, see http://www.iplantcollaborative.org/ for more information about iPlant, and http://www.iplantcollaborative.org/ci/iplant- science-apis for its APIs. Currently, 'rPlant' functions interact with the iPlant Agave API, the Taxonomic Name Resolution Service API, and the Phylotastic Taxosaurus API. Before using 'rPlant', users will have to register with the iPlant Collaborative. See http://agaveapi.co/ for more information on the Agave API and http://user.iplantcollaborative.org/ to register with iPlant.
